name: Immortal Pirate Island
description:
Title: Immortal Pirate Island

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer

Platformer Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: You have been transported to a strange pirate island. Collect all the golden crabs while avoiding the pirates in order to obtain immortality

Instructions: Use WASD to control your character.

Game Design Team:
Ethan Gibson – Game Designer
